name: Amira's Blessing (KB)
description:
Hello all~ This is the first PUBLIC draft of Amira's Blessing by me and Jebby! Full credits will be posted below SOON!

Also, please be aware that we are having some strange issues with the canvas on computers that run macOS -- both in the browser-playable version, and the downloadable MAC file. Soooo if you're not on Windows, the game might look a little funky.

:3
